about_the_game:
The Tower Between Us is a 2D Hand Drawn, highly-intense metroidvania, telling the struggle of Mahina and Ayana, two women who took part in the tale of the construction of the legendary Tower of Babel. Aside from this feat, there was the burden of protecting the Tower from an ancient evil that lurks within.

Fast-paced Metroidvania

A game about the captivating story of Mahina and Ayana, whose friendship directly impacts the game mechanics through a system of active and passive skills, resembling retro 90's games. Come rescue that amazing feeling of responsiveness through each level, as you guide them through this historical adventure in The Tower Between Us.

Detailed Game Developing

The game is still in development, and we sincerely hope that you like it as much as we do, for we have been putting our hearts into it, so to create a game that is worthy of being in your library =).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 970 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700HQ CPU @ 2.81 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1070
